Summary: 3 lights in field,1 fading,another appearing the 3rd appeared & disappearing
divs: sighting detailsfirst saw three lights just above trees, one fading,another appearing, the the third one appearing and disappearing. drove about 5 more mile toward home, saw one light again and went to get my son from house about 1\2 mile away. went back to the cotton field, stood around and explained to my son what i saw and exactly where is was located. both of us were looking around when it appeared again, but as soon as my son turned to look at it , it was gone again. this was my third sighting. at that time, my son thought i was crazy, but was willing to hang around for 5 more minutes. five minutes passed, and disappointed i instructed my son to get in the car.once i tured(sic) around to get in the car, it appeared again, but this time it lit up the sky! four or five lights flashed one by one to the left, then four or five to the right(all amber colored), the a "v" shape appeared with the same color lights and shape, but all lights never shining at the same time. it disaapeared just like that! it was amazing and was huge!
